title: Dictionary Lookup
code:
§begin lookup
  data ← §create_map
  data["name"] ← "Voyager"
  data["year"] ← 2157
  data["status"] ← "active"
  §transmit data["name"]
  §transmit data["year"]
§end
solution_description: creates a dictionary and retrieves values by key
hints: Square brackets access values by key
Data is stored and retrieved by string keys
